meta.name: linux-service-triage
meta.title: Linux Service Triage
meta.description: Diagnoses Linux service failures and recommends recovery steps.

original_definition.skill_description: Diagnoses Linux service failures and recommends recovery steps.

actions.name: Collect Service Logs
actions.description: Read systemd journal entries and service logs for the target service.

actions.name: Analyze Service Status
actions.description: Interpret service status codes and failure signals.

actions.name: Recommend Remediation
actions.description: Suggest recovery actions based on observed failure patterns.

rules.name: Confirm Service Exists
rules.condition_expression: Requested systemd service unit is installed

directives.name: Service Triage Completed
directives.description: Service failure diagnostics and remediation steps are delivered.

directives.name: Preserve System Safety
directives.description: Recommendations must avoid actions that could destabilize production systems.
